title: P2 mid/sup main looking for a team or just buds to play with.
body: Hey im just looking for a team of nontoxic buds to do flex with or just some cool buds to play norms with. Add me and shoot me a message:). was d4 last season looking to make d2 preferably.

replies.body:
Hi there! If you're looking for people to play ranked or normals you can go here https://ethereal-gaming.com/ we're a great community of friendly helpful gamers always looking for new people to join for games!

Look forward to hearing from you,

Gwazy.
